channel.title: Exercises: Inheritance :: C# Web Development
channel.description: Work on these exercises in a new Visual Studio .NET Core console app. Name your solution Technology and make a project inside of it with the same name. Class Design Create three classes inside your solution: Computer, Laptop, and SmartPhone Before you start coding anything inside these classes, diagram how the three classes are going to be related to each other. You can start with the diagram below. Be sure to show how the base class extends each subclass.
